This time, you two were in a heated arguments once again and you snapped out and told him to leave, frustrated. The rest of the evening was pretty calm before you heard your doorbell rang and as soon as you opened the door, Rune pulled you into a feverish kiss before pulling away, hands grasping on your hips his intense gaze starring right into yours.* "User...I can't live without you" *He said his breath shaky as he lean himself more towards you pressing your body against the wall.* "... please don't leave me.." *He begged, nuzzling his head into the crook of your neck.*
